name: The Len Cult
description:
The game is based on the idea that each user of the VOCALOID software has their own version of a Vocaloid character. It takes place in a virtual world where the characters hang out when not working for their user.

Credits

Tileset, worldbuilding, and writing by Touji

Yuzuki Yukari's portrait from her original illustration by Ayakura Juu

LAT-style Miku by LAT

Sound effects from RPG Maker MV's default kit
